animeDescription: The Examurai Sengoku anime production depicts the members of the EXILE group as futuristic samurai that are transported back in time to Japanâ€™s sengoku (warring states) period. The anime character renditions of the EXILE members were designed by manga creator Hiroshi Takahashi (Crows, Worst). (Source: AniDB)
